missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The door to the Back Room is locked. A hero can interact with the door to kick it in.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Back Room opens ({V}) or at the end of Round 3.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Open the door to the Back Room.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the Back Room.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

While Rebel forces scour the galaxy in search of information on Weiss's weapon project, Captain Solo hasn't checked in for a few days.

You're quick to remind your commander that this hasn't been unusual behavior for the smuggler, but she shrugs and replies, "Captain Solo said something about a promising lead in his last check-in. We just want to find him and follow up."

Thus, you now find yourselves retracing his previous steps. After going through several locations and contacts, this latest one shows promise. Not only does it represent Solo's last known location, but there are also a fair number of Imperial troops patrolling the nearby vicinity.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The door to the Back Room is locked. A hero can interact with the door to kick it in.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Back Room opens ({V}) or at the end of Round 3.

eventActions.newInstructions: All Imperial figures will spend an action to open a door if it is the quickest way to their target.

events.eventText:
Slipping through alleys and dodging past Imperial troops, you make your way to Han's ship. Chewbacca stands waiting at the hatch, releasing a guttural roar at the sight of Han. "Yeah, yeah, I know!" Han says, waving him off.

"Look, we're getting outta here, but this is everything I could find on the weapon." He hands you a small data cube before scrambling up the ramp into the Falcon.

The information obtained from the data cube reveals the weapon General Weiss is developing for capital ships. It's advanced and quite sophisticated, with destructive capabilities outclassing anything the Rebellion has at its disposal.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Place Story Mission card "Incoming" into play.
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

A blaster bolt clips Han's shoulder. With a shout of pain, he scrambles around a corner. Imperials move to block your path to him. Before ducking out of sight, he throws something toward you.

Amid a hail of blaster fire, you snatch up the object, a small data cube, and make your escape in the other direction.

The information obtained from the data cube reveals the weapon General Weiss is developing for capital ships. It's advanced and quite sophisticated, with destructive capabilities outclassing anything the Rebellion has at its disposal.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Drawn In" into play.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: The door separates the kitchen from the cantina.

events.eventText: A door at the back of the bar bursts open, and a battered Han Solo stumbles through the opening. His wrists are still bound, but in his hands he holds a blaster, firing back into the room he just departed.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door to the Back Room is locked tight. Muffled voiced can be heard from within.

{-} The door to the Back Room is locked. A hero can interact with the door to kick it in.

eventActions.tbText:
Han is bleeding from a couple of superficial wounds.

{-} <color="red">Han Solo</color> suffers 4 {H}.

Han Solo seemed to have had a disagreement with the soldiers guarding him.

{-} Each figure in the <color="red">Stormtrooper</color> group suffers 2 {H}.

eventActions.mainText:
You kick the door with all your power.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens from the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You kick as hard as you can, but the door does not buckle. You need to keep trying.

For each {B} rolled, place 1 strain token on the door.

events.eventText:
When you kicked in the door, you had expected to find a back room filled with Sabacc tables, not a fully functioning Imperial observation post. 

Screens cover the walls and voices crackle from multiple speakers. Computers and monitoring equipment are scattered everywhere. At the back of the room, in a small holding cell barred by a force field, sits Han Solo.

"Watch it!" he shouts, motioning to the troops in the room, who scramble for their weapons.

There's a small rumbling beneath your feet. The lights in the room flicker, and the force field dies. "Nice timing, Chewie," Han grins to himself as he dives for the nearest blaster.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door to the Back Room is locked tight. Muffled voiced can be heard from within.

{-} The door to the Back Room is locked. A hero can interact with the door to kick it in.

eventActions.tbText:
Han Solo is alive, but battered and exhausted.

{-} Exhaust <color="red">Han Solo</color>'s Deployment card.

events.eventText:
"You guys look familiar!" Han shouts, sending blaster fire toward his former captors. He opens his mouth to speak again but stops short, diving to the ground as the Imperials return fire.

"Talk later!" he calls out as he scrambles toward cover.

{-} Heroes control <color="red">Han Solo</color> as an ally.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the exit.
{-} <color="red">Han Solo</color> can escape through the exit.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Han Solo</color> escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Han Solo</color> is defeated.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Narrow pathways lead away from the cantina, making it easy to shake off pursuers.

{-} <color="red">Han Solo</color> can escape through the exit, ending the mission.

eventActions.tbText: As you scramble towards the exit, mechanical whirring announces the arrival of a relentless hunter, looking for Solo.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Heroes control <color="red">Han Solo</color> as an ally.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the exit.
{-} <color="red">Han Solo</color> can escape through the exit.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Han Solo</color> escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Han Solo</color> is defeated.

events.eventText:
IG-88 swivels his optical sensors towards the cantina, then starts to move towards it.

{-} <color="red">IG-88</color> moves 5 towards <color="red">Han Solo</color>.
One of the Imperials manages to get off a call for reinforcements.

Because Han had to free himself, the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
Because the heroes reached Han before he had to free himself, they receive 100 credits per hero.
